data: Gad | Meni | Quicksands | Saints' days | Banbury Hunt Club

In the religious cult of Gad and Meni, practised with such enthusiasm at Quicksands, the Saints' days were polo days, and the chief of all festivals the occasion of the match with the Banbury Hunt Club —Quicksands’s greatest rival.
